name: eskimi
description: To work with Eskimi front end you need to follow this steps #### Installation   - Install nodejs from [here](https://nodejs.org/en/download/)   - Install grunt from [here](https://gruntjs.com/getting-started)   - Go to project folder and run this `npm i` #### Working command - `grunt` it will create the assets for dev - `grunt server` it will create the assets for dev and watch the changes - `grunt build` it will create the assets for production
